articles.title: The coronavirus raging in Europe is a different variant - ForexLive
articles.description: Could it be easier to transmit? The spike in virus cases in Europe at the moment is dramatic and that may be due to lockdown fatigue and lower restrictions, but it could also be due to a different variant.
